entry.title: [CW] I don’t know if this is appropriate for a top level post but I was wondering how
entry.content:
I don’t know if this is appropriate for a top level post but I was wondering how the progressive left squares two sacred cows: (1) lived experience and (2) transgenderism.
Lived experience is the idea that for example a black person’s experience trumps any data a white person collects because living as a black person provides more info compared to any data a white person could analyze.
But a person “born” a male who appears a male and lives life as a male cannot have any experience as a woman; that is, just like the white person can’t really know what it’s like to be a black person a male cant really know what it is like or means to be a female.
So how can the male know he is a female if he can’t understand what a female is due to a lack of lived experience?
